TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Enlistment extends System.Object

summary.span: 在交易的最後階段，協助登記的交易參與者與交易管理員之間的通訊。

span.span: Facilitates communication between an enlisted transaction participant and the transaction manager during the final phase of the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當並方法物件叫用方式，是為了登記在交易中的參與者，則會傳回此物件，描述登記。When the and methods of the object are invoked to enlist a participant in a transaction, they return this object describing the enlistment. 在交易認可的最後一個階段，交易管理員將此物件傳遞到實作 resource manager已經登錄於交易中的介面。During the final phase of the transaction commit, the transaction manager passes this object to a resource manager implementing the interface that has enlisted in a transaction. 具體來說，交易管理員撥打或參與者，取決於是否後者已決定要認可或回復交易的方法。Specifically, the transaction manager calls either the or the method of the participant, depending on whether the latter has decided to commit or roll back the transaction. 參與者應該呼叫這個物件可讓交易管理員知道它已完成其工作的方法。The participant should call the method of this object to let the transaction manager know that it has completed its work. 可以呼叫登記它呼叫方法，在任何時間之前在 「 準備 」 階段。An enlistment can call the method at anytime before it has called in the prepare phase. 如此一來，編列正在轉換成唯讀的票數，這表示它投票認可交易，但是不需要接收最後的結果。By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome. 請注意之後,呼叫方法，已登錄的參與者接收來自交易管理員的任何進一步的通知。Note that, after the method is called, the enlisted participant receives no further notifications from the transaction manager. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面，以及當方法應該呼叫。The following example shows an implementation of the interface, and when the method should be called. [!code-csharp[Tx_Enlist#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/cs/enlist.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Tx_Enlist#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/tx_enlist/vb/enlist.vb#2)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

related.span: 將資源登記在交易中的參與者

span.span: Enlisting Resources As Participants In A Transaction

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Done() cil managed

summary.span: 指出交易參與者已完成其工作。

span.span: Indicates that the transaction participant has completed its work.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在交易認可的最後一個階段，交易管理員撥打，或參與者，根據是否應該認可或回復交易的方法。During the final phase of the transaction commit, the transaction manager calls either the , or method of the participant, depending on whether the transaction is to be committed or rolled back. 資源管理員應該執行任何必要的工作以完成交易，然後再告知交易管理員它已完成藉由呼叫方法`enlistment`參數。The resource manager should perform any work necessary to finish the transaction and then inform the transaction manager that it has finished by calling the method on the `enlistment` parameter. 如果資源管理員已永久，登錄，但不會回應呼叫方法中，交易管理員會確定資源管理員已收到個別通知呼叫。If the resource manager has enlisted durably, but does not respond by calling method, the transaction manager is unsure that the resource manager has received the respective notification call. 此情況下，交易管理員會等候回應，並維護此交易的相關資訊。As such, the transaction manager keeps waiting for a response, and maintains information relevant to this transaction. 如果是絕不會呼叫，這項資訊是有關無限期保留在記憶體中或全系統資源。If is never called, this piece of information is kept around indefinitely in memory or in a system-wide resource. 這會導致無法回收資源。This results in resources not being able to be reclaimed. 如果是分散式的交易，這可能最終會填滿突然停止 MSDTC 程序的 MSDTC 記錄檔。In the case of a distributed transaction, this could eventually fill the MSDTC log which halts the MSDTC process. 在所管理的交易的情況下，這會導致資源管理員的程序的記憶體耗用量漸進且持續增加。In the case of a transaction managed by , this results in a gradual and continual increase in the memory consumption of the resource manager's process. 因此，很重要，您可以呼叫方法，您的資源管理員完成後您準備工作。Therefore, it is crucial that you call the method once your resource manager is done with your prepare work. 可以呼叫登記它呼叫方法，在任何時間之前在 「 準備 」 階段。An enlistment can call the method at anytime before it has called in the prepare phase. 如此一來，編列正在轉換成唯讀的票數，這表示它投票認可交易，但是不需要接收最後的結果。By doing so, the enlistment is casting a read only vote, meaning that it votes commit on the transaction but does not need to receive the final outcome. 請注意，會呼叫這個方法之後，已登錄的參與者收到任何告知交易管理員。Note that, after this method is called, the enlisted participant receives no further notifications from the transaction manager.
